channel.title: Animating a cape?
channel.description:
hey guys can somebody tell me how to animate a cape?
i dont know how and there is no tutorial for a cape (that i know of)
i know capes are really hard to animate, but i really want to know so i can add mine
can somebody please tell be how to?
i looked at cj's tut and the cape picture either wasnt loading for me, or its not posted yet
thank you

item.title: Animating a cape?
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Wait is there a program? or do you take a cape from RSMV and open it in meta and steal Jagex’s work in animating capes? =p

Read full topic

item.title: Animating a cape?
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

[quote=“wayzey, post:12, topic:282207”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=372879.msg2815791#msg2815791 date=1244284344]

Did you figure that out yourself??

Well…it’s a secret. ;p
[/quote]

hahah don’t do that to people. I know how it works too you’ve done like nothing xD
Funny how people are like WOW when they don’t understand something very simple.

I thought this comment was lol:

[quote author=recker450 link=topic=372879.msg2815370#msg2815370 date=1244250602]
wow it is complex
[/quote][/quote]

lol after reading a tut on how to make it animated i think i know how you figured it out

also i animated the cape and it is ownage

if you guys wanna see what it looks like here is it

http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,371298.0.html

if you want me to release, i will

Anyways, i’m currently doing this now, shouldn’t be too long, the VSKINS are extremely complex though, may be hard to understand.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 05-06-2009, 18:17:28[/size][hr]Okay, here you go.
